website_summaries.verdict: A superior karaoke system with enhancers that help put your best musical foot forward. An excellent option by a top name in the industry.
pros: Its balance control is off the charts
Microphone is robust and can hide some vocal flaws
Complete system with two mics is great for serious karaoke enthusiasts
cons: Slight distortion if you change playback speed
Price falls on the higher end of the scale, but you get a lot for your money

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT SHOW LYRICS IF YOU USE A SMART PHONE OR TABLET
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this machine is great however the wording on it its flawed. It says that it can be connected to the tv but it doesnt say that it will only work if you have a DVD with the lyrics, if you connect your phone it will only work as a speaker. YOU WILL NOT see the lyrics on your TV if you used your smart phone or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Danny S.

customer_reviews.title: unit did not work as expected
customer_reviews.text: The mic 2 input was not working...swapping microphone had no effect....bad internely returned for replacement....working ok now.....just a little hassel ....but amazon was very cooperative.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: How to returning
customer_reviews.text: I need to returning not working in Bluetooth and control do not working
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Arrived smashed
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived smashed. Not sure if the product is damaged but it sure doesn’t look good as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Donald B.

customer_reviews.title: This device Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Please DO NOT purchase this. Cheaply made No lyrics display via Bluetooth or USB.. only with the terrible DVDs/MP3 Discs. 300 nursery rhyme karaoke songs. What a joke and waste.. I'll be returning ASAP. Signed... A real verified purchaser
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Came broken. Not even same system. No screen no microphones. Wires hanging out dirty!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Hempen

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love it
customer_reviews.text: This unit was very easy to setup, bluetooth connected with no issue, and both microphones work perfectly. My kids use it almost daily. it has a stand for your phone, and a nice little display for the video although most of the time, we use our phones so the display doesn't work for that. Overall, a solid investment if you love karaoke.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Party Maker
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Karaoke player for Mom's Big Birthday. The Lyrics were BIG ENOUGH to see from a few feet away. And once my 3 year old granddaughter got the mike...it was AWESOME..and she entertained all 70 of us...didn't want to stop! Fabulous purchase...reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: cbirch

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for my 9 year old daughter! She loves it! The sound is great, the song selection that come with is pretty great too!
customer_reviews.author: DMarieHaze

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: I built a karaoke bar in my kitchen, since everything was closed for the Corona virus. I have literally had people tell me that it sounds better than the bars. I'm running it through a three thousand watt system, but it does everything I need it to, and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: First Unit Failed
customer_reviews.text: Two stars, because the video monitor and CD player did not work out of the box. Amazon quickly sent a replacement at no cost. (Thanks Amazon! Y'all rock.) Given other reviews and my experience, I would not recommend buying this unit. This is unfortunate because other than the initial out of the box reliability, it seems to be a reasonable product. Hopefully the unit will continue to work without any further problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unless you're under 10 or very easily satified DON'T BUY THIS CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: This is a toy! It's not for anyone who really knows how to sing and is looking for a quality sound which they can record. If you're looking for something without much volume and 2 CDs of completely worthless songs which is a total piece of crap. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: I am an ex singer and do not like it
customer_reviews.text: If you are a parent now and used to sing in a band or whatever, missed your boat and want your family to hear you sing do NOT buy this thing. It sounds dull and awful. It's nowhere near the same as a PA please know that. Sounds like you are singing in the next room and someone can hear you through a wall. The echo is set to a static ms and it's way too fast. For anyone else go for it, it will be fun. This thing will disappoint anyone that has ever sang into a mic for real.
customer_reviews.author: Texasdude

customer_reviews.title: Mic does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a week and mics completely stopped working for no reason. Really wanted to use it for my new year party but didn’t work. Very disappointed. Returning for a full refund!
customer_reviews.author: Beth vang

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and ruined birthday party
customer_reviews.text: It came broken; not able to read CD or play bluetooth. It appeared that it had already been returned once and was taped up and sent out again. Got the microphones to work, but the sound was muted. Hooked up cell phone with cord and was able to get music from web, but there was buzzing, maybe when the microphone cord was near the phone cord. I gave up trying to figure it out. Just apologized to my sister for the birthday present fail.
customer_reviews.author: Olofson

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better, it's Amazon... Most of the items are made in China...
customer_reviews.author: Pedro O. Servano IV

customer_reviews.title: Family fun time!
customer_reviews.text: Great karaoke machine with amazing sound. We use the cdg-cd's, and lyrics are a nice readable size. I can't really comment on the Bluetooth part yet. Perfect for our weekend family karaoke.
customer_reviews.author: L P

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought that it would have been a little better but the sound isn't too good and it's not at all what I expected. It's a waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Dartita

customer_reviews.title: Karaoke Machine
customer_reviews.text: We love this machine - when we got it, it wouldn't play the CDS - that was a little disappointing, BUT the company made it right and sent us a new machine along with a few extra accessories. We are loving are machine. Really livens up a party.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L. Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Most people use Blue Tooth and smart phone for karaoke but I'm old fashioned.
customer_reviews.text: My use of karaoke is to entertain at resthomes. This unit is perfect for me as I can attach a speaker if I need to enhance the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: They bought this for our special needs daughter who loves music. she will spend hours singing and loves this karaoke machine.
customer_reviews.author: shoppinfool

customer_reviews.title: Ok machine
customer_reviews.text: Only could use CD's it looks like and the music that was in there was awful
customer_reviews.author: paul lentine

customer_reviews.title: Has it all!
customer_reviews.text: This always comes out at family get together’s ! It engages all ages and is so much fun. The sound is great and enables us to play music that appeals to young, old, and in between.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine and kids love it too, I just couldn't give it 5 stars cause it seems when you turn up one mic the other isn't heard as well, so when 2 people are singing, one is heard more than the other, maybe just human error idk. But otherwise it's a very fun, good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, but a bit big for us
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked well, just a little bit big for our likes. All connectivity worked great and functioned as expected.
customer_reviews.author: smarties-pants

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a light weight, compact unit that is easy to transport and has great sound! I have only played CD's but they sound great and the mics are clear.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Randal V. Quick

customer_reviews.title: Good and fun
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have ordered more disks. The machine does not show words across screen for the bluetooth part which means use a tablet. If you use your phone it's hard to see the words
customer_reviews.author: Jerry miller

customer_reviews.title: No words
customer_reviews.text: Only shows the words if you have a CD. Does not if you use the phone. But works.
customer_reviews.author: Maynard Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Bad cdg player
customer_reviews.text: I played 1 CD in it and wouldn't play again.This player was the 3rd one we purchased and the other 2 are working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lally's

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a different machine with this one and this one is so much better!! Love that it comes with two mics
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have spent a little more for better
customer_reviews.text: Not loud enough, need to hook up to tv for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Your name (victim)

customer_reviews.title: Microphone don’t work
customer_reviews.text: One of the microphones don’t work. How do I get it fixed. I bought insurance
customer_reviews.author: Grace Beaman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item as soon as I opened it, therefore I do not know how the quality of sound is. To me it seemed very cheaply made and not worth the money, another reason I did not like it was because the microphones are not Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Missing AC adapter!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: How can I get one without returning the entire machine?!?!!?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad unit for the price. buzzing sound is annoying when unit is turned on,
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Figure out
customer_reviews.text: It's not to hard to figure out how to use, pretty simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Weaver

customer_reviews.title: I don't like these cheap little plastic speakers
customer_reviews.text: Was way smaller than I thought it should be, I'm not able to cast the smaller screen to a TV, which is lame. The sound quality is low with a speaker this small, Overall would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought I’m very upset
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that u have to have the mic right on ur mouth in order to hear it well and cover the mic with you hand in order to hear the voice better. I need a refund. A karaoke machine is for singing and music not just music. These microphone are not gd quality
customer_reviews.author: Susan Victoria Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great our son loved it!! Very happy so far with my choice!!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia fox

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, great price! And delivered to your door!
customer_reviews.text: Great got this 7 months ago and still using it. Bring fAmily together.
customer_reviews.author: Lisbette Soto

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is not very good and already have 1 of the microphones that does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected it to be better quality.
customer_reviews.author: jodi lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Fin w/Music
customer_reviews.text: I'm having sooo much fun with this item. I'm so glad I decided to invest.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Karaoke
customer_reviews.text: My own personal use to practice. Also in my husband's music studio, when someone forgets theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Rusti Noland

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the family. Really liked this machine but wish it had better controls on the tones.
customer_reviews.author: consulb

customer_reviews.title: Loaded with the worst music ever
customer_reviews.text: I basically just bought a speaker. The music provided was HORRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and I recommend it. Buy the compatible CDs for part music to sing along to.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fantaistic
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. I haven't tried to hook it up to blue tooth yet so I didn't rate that.
customer_reviews.author: kristine

customer_reviews.title: Wires break easily with hardly any movement. Like they were dry rotted. Sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Two of my wires broke immediately with hardly and force of movement. Now one microphone unusable. Only second time using it. Sound is not loud. Sucks. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Life of the party
customer_reviews.text: This machine is so much fun!!!! High quality. Easy to use. Came with 200 songs.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize both mics are wired. not as convenient, can't move around with the mic
customer_reviews.author: joyce harris

customer_reviews.title: Great for little performers
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son’s fifth birthday and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ease of setting up with clear directions on set up. The small screen is a nice extra, along with the 2 microphones for duets.
customer_reviews.author: slugger103

customer_reviews.title: Missing operators manual and discs - not in GF844 box. It does play my own CD.
customer_reviews.text: no discs received to operate the unit, other components appear to be in the GF844 package. Please provide an operators manual and the 2 missing discs.
customer_reviews.author: MarTech2

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product twice and I am the speaker has a low quality sound and one of microphones do not work. Would not reccomend this product at all
customer_reviews.author: N  H.

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. My 15 year old son is very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The microphone quality is not the best but I can upgrade those on my own. Overall really enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: beester

customer_reviews.title: Rather low quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty low quality. Seems like it will break easily. Couldn’t get it to connect to my tv using the wires they supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter love it and her friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised. Sound is great
customer_reviews.text: I am having a lot of fun using the unit. As I use it I learn more about its capabilities. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: get something with better sound
customer_reviews.text: the mics were lousy sound for what I paid for it..

customer_reviews.text: There is no Bluetooth connection the button does not work

product_meta.title: Karaoke USA Karaoke System - Portable, Black, 18.50" x 13.60" x 10.70" (GF844)
product_meta.description:
Now with more power! And connect your smart device With Bluetooth! Enjoy your music on a more powerful speaker with no wires! This karaoke player has a sleek design matched by no other player you'll ever find. It's features will keep any karaoke enthusiast busy.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Karaoke USA GF844 Complete Bluetooth Karaoke Machine with 7" TFT Color Screen, Record Function
feature_bullets: 7" TFT Digital Color Screen. AC Adaptor - 110V/50Hz~AC 240V/60Hz (UL Approved). 3.5mm to RCA Audio Cable
Record Voice and Music Mix. USB Flash/ SD Card Compatible

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars292 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
